file_insights.main_purpose: Comprehensive verification of RAG workflow end-to-end

patterns_discovered: Async testing approach with mock dependencies
Modular test functions for individual graph nodes
Systematic verification of query classification and retrieval
Multi-type query handling (drug info, guidelines, clinical)
gotchas_discovered: Mocking external services like search and LLM
Ensuring consistent state propagation through graph nodes
Managing environment variables for test configurations
recommendations: Continue using async testing for complex workflows
Ensure comprehensive mocking of external dependencies
Implement detailed logging and error handling
Expand test cases to cover edge scenarios
